statements: UPDATE game_players SET player_score = 100 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE game_players SET player_name = 'Alice', player_level = 2 WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE game_players SET player_score = 1000, player_level = 5 WHERE player_id = 1
UPDATE game_players SET player_name = 'Alice', player_score = 500, player_level = player_level + 1 WHERE player_id = 3
UPDATE players SET player_score = 100 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE game_sessions SET session_date = '2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE session_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890';
UPDATE players SET player_score = player_score + 10 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE game_sessions SET session_date = NOW(), session_name = 'New Session' WHERE session_id = '98765432-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Players SET player_score = 100 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE GameSessions SET total_players = 15, end_time = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE session_id = 5;
UPDATE Players SET player_name='Alice', player_score=500 WHERE player_id=1;
UPDATE GameSessions SET game_mode='Multiplayer', total_players=10 WHERE session_id=2;
UPDATE players SET player_level = 10 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE games SET game_genre = 'Action' WHERE game_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE players SET player_level = 10, player_score = 500 WHERE player_id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4bed';
UPDATE player_game_progress SET progress_status = 'Completed', progress_percentage = 100 WHERE player_id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4bed' AND game_id = '2f6dadfd-58fc-4630-b1d5-57d21dd6c79e';
UPDATE Player SET player_level = 5 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE Game SET game_genre = 'Action' WHERE game_id = 1;
UPDATE Player SET player_name = 'John Doe', player_level = 10 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE Game SET game_genre = 'Action' WHERE game_id = 5;
